title: How to Get Fortnite Skins on PS4

steps.headline: Press the PS button to go to the PlayStation dashboard.
Select Fortnite and press X to launch it.
steps.description: The exact location of the Fortnite tile will vary depending on the other games and applications you have installed on your PS4.

steps.headline: Press X on the splash screen.
Select Battle Royale on the Select Game Mode page and press X.
steps.description: You cannot purchase skins while in other Fortnite modes.

steps.headline: Press the controller's triangle button on the News page.
steps.description: This takes you to the Fortnite Item Shop.

steps.headline: Highlight a skin you wish to buy and press X.
steps.description: This brings you to that skin's page. Only a few skins are available in the Item Shop at any given time. The skins available in the Item Shop rotate every 24 hours.

steps.headline: Press the square button to select Purchase.
steps.description: This adds the skin to your Fortnite account. If there are extra cosmetic items included with the skin, the button will read Purchase Items instead. If you don't have enough V-Bucks in your Fortnite account, the button will read Get V-Bucks instead. Pressing the square button in this situation sends you to the Store tile, where you can choose how many V-Bucks you wish to purchase. Once you've done so, return to the Item Shop and use the V-Bucks to purchase the selected skin. To view your purchased skins, press the controller's circle button, then select Locker from the menu at the top of the screen. Highlight the Outfit option in the Locker and press X. This shows you a page with all of the skins associated with your account. Select one and press X to use it.

text: Press the PS button to go to the PlayStation dashboard.  Select Fortnite and press X to launch it. The exact location of the Fortnite tile will vary depending on the other games and applications you have installed on your PS4. Press X on the splash screen. This continues loading the game. Select Battle Royale on the Select Game Mode page and press X. You cannot purchase skins while in other Fortnite modes. Press the controller's triangle button on the News page. This takes you to the Fortnite Item Shop. Highlight a skin you wish to buy and press X. This brings you to that skin's page. Only a few skins are available in the Item Shop at any given time. The skins available in the Item Shop rotate every 24 hours. Press the square button to select Purchase. This adds the skin to your Fortnite account. If there are extra cosmetic items included with the skin, the button will read Purchase Items instead. If you don't have enough V-Bucks in your Fortnite account, the button will read Get V-Bucks instead. Pressing the square button in this situation sends you to the Store tile, where you can choose how many V-Bucks you wish to purchase. Once you've done so, return to the Item Shop and use the V-Bucks to purchase the selected skin. To view your purchased skins, press the controller's circle button, then select Locker from the menu at the top of the screen. Highlight the Outfit option in the Locker and press X. This shows you a page with all of the skins associated with your account. Select one and press X to use it.
